alert.note: Alert for Redwood (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 20 at 1:03AM CDT until April 26 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Minnesota... Redwood River near Redwood Falls affecting Redwood County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Minnesota... Minnesota River At Morton affecting Renville and Redwood Counties. .Heavy rain this evening has brought increasing river levels which will continue into Thursday or Friday. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Redwood River near Redwood Falls. * WHEN...Until early Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 8.5 feet, Swayback bridge in Redwood Falls overtopped. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1200 AM CDT Thursday, the stage was 5.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early this morning to a crest of 7.5 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage Tuesday morning. - Flood stage is 6.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 7.5 feet on 04/22/1995. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
